email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you consider coming down to the low $50s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton, but that’s as low as we can go. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

$51.25 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for October 15-20 and confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great! I’ll lock in the laycan for October 15-20 and confirm the demurrage at $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement by end of day today. Let me know if there’s anything else you need.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ll review the charter party agreement once it’s sent. Looking forward to finalizing this deal.

Best,
John
